# we can use comment using '#'

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5) # it is needed first of all to work the cmake futher

project(HelloApp
        VERSION 0.0.1
        DESCRIPTION "The leading Hello World App"
        LANGUAGES CXX)

# It is target, which will be generated by the build system
add_executable(HelloAppBinary main.cpp)

target_compile_features(HelloAppBinary PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
